title: The Education of Henry Adams - statement implies

content.prompt: The statement "the charms...ancients" most clearly implies which of the following about New England contrasts?

choices.label: They are the undesirable result of outdated customs.
They came about naturally, not from established social customs.
They tend to make people forget the teachings of their elders.
They foster local agricultural methods rather than hinder them.

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
